EmailTemplate.name: EmailToFiscalFromPO
EmailTemplate.subject: Payment Request {!PaymentRequest__c.Name} has been rejected.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PaymentRequest__c.FiscalApprover__c}, This email is to notify you that, the Payment Request #{!PaymentRequest__c.Name} for {!PaymentRequest__c.LEAName__c} for ${!PaymentRequest__c.TotalRequestedAmountthisAction__c} has been rejected by the Financial Approver and has been sent back to the Sub-recipient.
Payment Request Details: Award: #{!PaymentRequest__c.Award__c} Project Period: {!PaymentRequest__c.BillingStartDate__c} - {!PaymentRequest__c.BillingEndDate__c}
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
